body.name: Baby Delight Go With Me Nod Deluxe Portable Crib & Playard, Charcoal Tweed
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 55 mins
features: SUPER FAST SETUP - Install in 60 seconds or less with no need for tools or hardware. Simply remove from the carrying bag, unwrap the crib, expand each corner, lock corners into place, and set the mattress in the bottom of the crib.

OUR ON-THE-GO SOLUTION - As a parent, we know that life takes you many different places. Because of that, we designed this crib to be lightweight and easy to fold. It is perfect for at home, at the park, or even at grandma and grandpa’s!

COMFORTABLE AND BREATEABLE - The Nod Deluxe was created for ideal comfortability. Our plush mattress gives your baby a comfortable place to sleep while the mesh walls provide ideal airflow and visibility.

MAXIMUM SAFETY & STYLE - JMPA Certified and was designed with maximum safety. Our mesh fabric and charcoal tweed is meant to fit into any home’s décor. At Baby Delight, we believe that parents shouldn’t have to sacrifice style for safety. Recommended age range is 0-3 years and height is up to 35”.
DESIGNED IN USA - Trusted by parents for over 20 years. Locally owned and operated in Rhode Island, USA.
body.description: The Go With Me Nod Portable Playard was created to give your little one a safe and stylish place to sleep at home and on the go. The Nod can be assembled in seconds with no tools needed. A plush mattress gives your baby a comfortable place to sleep while the mesh walls are ideal for air flow and visibility. The zipper door allows you to lay next to your little one and comfort her when needed. And when messes happen (because they do!), the fabric is fully removable and can be machine washed. When it’s time to travel or store the Travel Crib away, simply click two buttons to fold it compactly and put it into the included travel bag.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our Charcoal Tweed family of baby gear was designed with both function and aesthetic in mind. The Slumber and Nod are great for naps around the house and on the go. The Beside Me Dreamer Bassinet and Bedside Sleeper can be used as a standalone bassinet or as a bedside sleeper to co-sleep. All of the products in this line were designed with sleek, modern lines in a luxe grey fabric to fit with the aesthetic of your home Go With Me Nod Go With Me Alpine Beside Me Dreamer Bassinet Go With Me Slumber Portable Bassinet Go With Me Span Portable Gate Go With Me Nod Deluxe Portable Travel Crib The Go With Me Nod Deluxe Portable Travel Crib was created to give your little one a safe and stylish place to sleep at home and on the go. A plush mattress gives your baby a comfortable place to sleep while the mesh walls are ideal for air flow and visibility. The zipper door allows you to lay next to your little one and comfort him/her when needed. And when messes happen (because they do!), the fabric is fully removable and can be machine washed. Compact fold and carry bag for portability Easy, tool-free assembly Mesh walls for visibility and air flow Plush mattress for added comfort Removable and machine washable cover Zipper door for convenience Size: 44” x 23” x 26” | 13.9 lbs Recommended to use up to 35” in height | 0-3 years | 50 lbs | JPMA Certified

Product Details and Features Use Inside. The Nod was designed with an in-home aesthetic. The Charcoal Tweed fashion goes with any home's style and can really be used in any room that you need it. Whether it be in the living room, kitchen or bedroom, the Nod is the perfect space your for baby to play or rest. Use Outside. Easily transport the Nod outside when the weather is nice and your little one will have a safe place to play or nap. And if the material gets a little dirty, simply remove it and toss it into the washer! Full Visibility. Safety is always our priority, so we always include as much mesh as possible. It makes the products ultra breathable while also increasing air flow. It's also much easier to peek in on that cute little face! Portability Is Key. Just like the rest of our Go With Me line, the Nod quickly folds up and fits into the included carry bag. In just seconds you'll be off and ready for your next adventure!

About Baby Delight At Baby Delight we believe in bringing parents closer to their families as they experience all of the bumps in the road along the way. Let’s face it, being a parent is hard. Like, really hard. But it’s also the most rewarding thing we’ll ever do. Most of us here at Baby Delight are parents, so we understand each and every aspect of the job. We know the ups. We know the downs. And we are very familiar with everything in between. When we come up with product ideas and begin the development process, we are not only thinking about the babies and children that will be using our products. We’re thinking of you. The mom. The dad. The caregiver. Our bassinets, crib and loungers are comfortable and safe for your little ones while providing you with some peace of mind. And our gear products are durable, versatile and portable. Ideal for both you and your babe. We understand that parenthood is a journey. Each day is an adventure. Let us help make yours just a little bit easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for traveling
reviews.reviewText: This is really a great product! All of the reviews that talk about it being hard to snap into place- this is only true if you leave the top cover attached while trying to snap it. If you unhook the cover it pops right into place and then you replace the cover. It’s narrower than a regular pack and play, which makes it great for smaller travel spaces. We took it camping and used it in the bunk room of an RV!The only thing I don’t like is that there are no specific sheets- I padded it with a blanket and used a regular crib sheet but it was still oversized and I would not have felt comfortable using it with an infant or any baby that would be at risk of suffocating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This is SUPER easy to travel around with! Haven’t flown with it, but have taken it to several hotels and it’s been great with its compact size. Much easier to fold/unfold compared to a traditional pack & play!I also like that there’s not really a weight limit bc it rests on the floor!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s perfect for our small apartment . I paired it with a 3 in thick baby memory foam mattress . And my daughter loved it immediately . She is 14 months . Slept amazing on it . I watched her on the monitor .and could visibly see how well she slept ! Highly recommend if you want your baby to sleep well, and want an excellent travel crib or just a crib for a a tiny living space .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must-have Item for New Moms!
reviews.reviewText: As a mom of two-under-two, I am thrilled with the Baby Delight Go With Me Portable Crib and Play yard. I highly recommend for anyone who is looking for a portable crib as this is something you could use for years.Why I love it:-First off, the design and color! I love the look of the charcoal tweed compared to other play yards out there.-It's so versatile - I could have my 20 month old playing in it outside as a play yard or I can use it inside for my 3 month old to take a nap.-I love the zipper feature - my 20 month old uses this as his portable crib when he sleeps at my parents and it's now such a comfort to him. When he goes into his room at night, he automatically crawls in through the zipper part and knows it's time for bed. It's so cute! This is a key feature for caregivers who may not be able to bend over to lift a heavy toddler in and out of a pack and play.-Love the travel bag and how easy it is to collapse.There are so many portable cribs on the market and hands down, this is the best. You will not be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Longer than pack n play!
reviews.reviewText: -1 star because product had a weird burnt or smoke smell. Missed return window, but otherwise good product! Bigger than the pack n play we have and fit our very tall toddler. Would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This company knows quality
reviews.reviewText: Going from the bed side bassinet to a pack n play. I bought this item with no reviews to go off of. hoping that it was just as amazing as their bassinet. We are trying to stay minimal until we get moved into our home. So I’ve been using my sister standard graco pack n play from time to time, but it’s absolutely horrid having to put up and take down. IT SHOULD NOT TAKE THAT MUCH MAN POWER! I personally like the floor level bed and the ability my daughter has to just craw in or out to during her exploration (of course I have to open/close it). This bed is super simple, light, durable, and cozy! It’s a win all around for us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the Competition
reviews.reviewText: Have owned a number of small/ultra portable cribs and so far this model is among the best. It's super lightweight so it's easy to get in and out of the closet and setup when my grandson visits. After setting it up once, it's very intuitive how the parts snap into place and it takes less than a minute to get setup. The dimensions are pretty in line with other lightweight cribs. Bear in mind this isn't mean to compete with a full-sized complete playyard with changing table and bassinet and everything. It's great as a temporary/few days setup that's safe and easy to put up and down.
